# Acknowledgments

This analysis was supported in part by the Digital Research Alliance of Canada. I would to acknowledge the excellent support team at the Alliance for their help, as well as the creators of QIIME2, the QIIME2 forum and the various tools available through the QIIME2 plug-ins. I would also like to acknowlege the Langille Lab of Dalhousie University for their documentation on 16S Microbiome analysis ([Microbiome Helper](https://github.com/LangilleLab/microbiome_helper)). This work is a part of Bosch et al. **1** and supports the research of the Paleoecological Laboratory in Memorial University of Newfoundland.
